name: Chinese Emacs Configuration
short_description: Chinese Emacs Configuration(emacs_chinese) provide chinese configuration of gnu emacs under popular OS(windows, Linux, Freebsd,etc), also provide a lot of emacs package configurations. I just want to simplify the installation and custmaization of gnu emac
